definition: hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: He came to welcome me with a handshake.
sentences.chinese: 他來與我握手錶示歡迎。

sentences.english: Your watch will be repaired free if it is still under guarantee.
sentences.chinese: 你的手錶在保修期內可享受免費修理。

sentences.english: I catch a watch in the scratching match.
sentences.chinese: 我在抓癢比賽中抓到一塊手錶。

sentences.english: Here is a little background on why I splurged and bought such an expensive running tool.
sentences.chinese: 這裏有些我爲什麼要買這個如此昂貴的跑步手錶。

sentences.english: B:I took off my shirt and my watch and jumped into the water.
sentences.chinese: 我脫掉上衣，解下手錶，跳進水裏。

sentences.english: Since then, the styles have changed, different types of watches have been added to the repartee .
sentences.chinese: 從那時起，風格變了，不同類型的手錶被添加到妙答。

sentences.english: A Swatch was given to me by my uncle.
sentences.chinese: 這隻斯沃琪牌的手錶是叔叔給我的。

sentences.english: The country's leading export is watches.
sentences.chinese: 這個國家的主輸出品是手錶。

sentences.english: You've tried setting your watch several minutes ahead, but you're still late.
sentences.chinese: 你已經把手錶調快了幾分鐘，可你還是遲到了。

sentences.english: Janet pulled the page from her typewriter and looked nervously at her wrist-watch.
sentences.chinese: 簡尼特從她的打字機裏抽出紙，緊張地看了看手錶。

sentences.english: You bought this watch only for 30 dollars? It’s dirt cheap.
sentences.chinese: 這塊手錶才花了30美元，真是太便宜了。

sentences.english: He was momentarily blinded by the reflection of the sun off his watch.
sentences.chinese: 手錶反射的太陽光讓他有一霎那的失明。

sentences.english: It's like a watch – there are various levels of intricacy .
sentences.chinese: 這就像手錶，有各式各樣的複雜程度。

sentences.english: My watch needs winding every day.
sentences.chinese: 我的手錶需要每天上弦。

sentences.english: Together, the five brands account for roughly half of all watch sales in China.
sentences.chinese: 上述五大手錶品牌基本上佔中國手錶銷售總額的一半。

definition: to (carry) on one's person/to (take) with one
